backend/main.mo: Main canister logic for website content and user profile management with admin-gated draft editing and publishing.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old websiteContent state into new draft and live content fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking feature IDs to affected frontend files and components with test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS theme defining warm color variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, favicon, dark mode root class, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Public site entry component fetching live content and rendering main sections with an optional admin editor dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: UI component showing a generic error message when the editor cannot load.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEdito: Draft-content editor with tabs, form fields, saving, publish confirmation, and preview mode.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChangeEdit: Empty or placeholder dialog component for changing the edit password.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name via profile query and mutation.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Heade: Responsive header with site title, section scroll buttons, and an editor launcher for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Static content section displaying a title, body, and three feature cards.
Footer showing custom text, attribution link, and current year.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with configurable text, image, alignment, and a scroll-to-content button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAccess.ts: Legacy hook returning whether the authenticated caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousActor.ts: Provides a singleton anonymous backend actor via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonymousWebsiteCo: Hooks for loading, updating, and publishing draft website content using the anonymous actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks that load and mutate live content, user profiles, and roles using an actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color variables and dark mode tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Tailwind, Internet Identity, and React Query client.
frontend/src/utils/heroLayout.ts: Utility functions mapping alignment and position values to Tailwind CSS classes for hero layouts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, pending requests, architectural notes, and versioning.
